title: Episode 1
desc: The citizens worry they will be at the Titans' mercy after many years of peace.

title: Episode 2
desc: The Shiganshina citizens are under attack from the Titans.

title: Episode 3
desc: Eren butt heads with Jean Kirschtein, a cadet who wants to be in the Military Police Regiment. Berholt and Reiner help Eren learn during training.
